item.title: argument
item.description: event.argument Type String Event fbapplink See also fbapplink facebook.* Overview The argument bundle string. Android only.

item.title: audio
item.description: event.audio Type String Event onProgress Platform Android See also onProgress texttospeech.* Overview A chunk of raw audio data that is going to be passed to the speech output.

item.title: baseDir
item.description: object.baseDir Type Constant See also Image vk.* Overview Directory constant corresponding to the base directory of the image file. Default value is system.ResourceDirectory unless specified otherwise where this object is used.

item.title: beam
item.description: nfc.beam() Type Function Return value none Platform Android only See also nfc.* Overview Beam prepares the device for beaming an NDEF message to another device. The transfer starts when two devices are put near together. Syntax nfc.beam(params) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call.

item.description: object:beginReliableWrite() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:beginReliableWrite()

item.title: cancel
item.description: vibrator.cancel() Type Function Return value none See also vibrator.* Overview Cancels the currently ongoing vibration. Syntax vibrator.cancel()

item.title: cancelBeam
item.description: nfc.cancelBeam() Type Function Return value none Platform Android only See also nfc.* Overview Cancels any previously prepared with nfc.beam() message. Syntax nfc.cancelBeam()

item.title: cancelConnection
item.description: object:cancelConnection() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:cancelConnection( device ) device required Device.

item.title: class
item.description: object.class Type String See also bluetooth.* Overview "audio video camcorder", "audio video car audio", "audio video handsfree", "audio video headphones", "audio video hifi audio", "audio video loudspeaker", "audio video microphone", "audio video portable audio", "audio video set top box", "audio video uncategorized", "audio video vcr", "audio video video camera", "audio video video conferencing", "audio video ideo display and loudspeaker", "audio video video gaming toy", "audio video video monitor", "audio video wearable headset", "computer desktop", "computer handheld pc pda", "computer laptop", "computer palm size pc pda", "computer server", "computer uncategorized", "computer wearable", "health blood pressure", "health data display", "health glucose", "health pulse oximeter", "health pulse rate", "health thermometer", "health uncategorized", "health weighing", "phone cellular", "phone cordless", "phone isdn", "phone modem or gateway", "phone smart", "phone uncategorized", "toy controller", "toy doll action figure", "toy game", "toy robot", "toy uncategorized", "toy vehicle", "wearable glasses", "wearable helmet", "wearable jacket", "wearable pager", "wearable uncategorized", "wearable wrist watch".

item.title: close
item.description: nfc.close() Type Function Return value none Platform iOS only See also nfc.* Overview Closes an opened NFC reading dialog. Syntax nfc.close()

item.title: connect
item.description: bluetooth.connect() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.connect( params ) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. device required Device. autoConnect optional Boolean. default is false. onCharacteristicChanged optional Listener. onCharacteristicRead optional Listener. onCharacteristicWrite optional Listener. onConnectionStateChange optional Listener. onDescriptorRead optional Listener.

item.title: connect
item.description: object:connect() Type Function Return value Gatt See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:connect( params ) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. autoConnect optional Boolean. default is false. onCharacteristicChanged optional Listener. onCharacteristicRead optional Listener. onCharacteristicWrite optional Listener. onConnectionStateChange optional Listener. onDescriptorRead optional Listener. onDescriptorWrite optional Listener.

item.description: object:connect() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:connect()

item.title: connect
item.description: object:connect() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:connect( device, [autoconnect] ) device required Device. autoconnect optional Boolean.

item.description: texttospeech.continue() Type Function Return value none See also texttospeech.* Overview Resumes a previous paused speech. Syntax texttospeech.continue()

item.description: event.count Type Integer Event onProgress Platform Not Android See also onProgress texttospeech.* Overview The number of characters of the substring from the passed text, that is currently being processed.

item.title: engines
item.description: event.engines Type Table Event init Platform Android See also init texttospeech.* Overview The list of available engines. Keys are engine names, values are engine identifiers. Sample output { ['Google Text-to-speech Engine'] = 'com.google.android.tts', ['Pico TTS'] = 'com.svox.pico' }

item.title: errorCode
item.description: event.errorCode Type Number Event init See also init nfc.* Overview Unique error code, present when event.isError is true, nil otherwise. Possible values: 'no nfc' 'nfc disabled'

item.title: errorCode
item.description: event.errorCode Type Number Event nfc See also nfc nfc.* Overview Unique error code, present when event.isError is true, nil otherwise. On iOS closing the NFC reading dialog generates an error event, but it should not be treated as an error, just a notification of a closed dialog. iOS values 'nfcreader_unsupported_feature' 'nfcreader_security_violation' 'nfcreader_transceive_tag_connection_lost' 'nfcreader_transceive_retry_exceeded' 'nfcreader_transceive_tag_response_error' 'nfcreader_session_invalidation_user_canceled' 'nfcreader_session_invalidation_session_timeout' 'nfcreader_session_invalidation_terminated_unexpectedly' 'nfcreader_session_invalidation_system_is_busy' 'nfcreader_session_invalidation_first_ndef_tag_read' 'nfctag_command_configuration_invalid_parameters'

item.title: errorCode
item.description: event.errorCode Type Number Event writeTag See also writeTag nfc.* Overview Unique error code, present when event.isError is true, nil otherwise. Possible values: 'not writable' 'no space' 'write fail' 'bad format' 'unknown' 'no records' 'no tag'

item.title: errorCode
item.description: event.errorCode Type Number Event show See also show qrscanner.* Overview Unique error code, present when event.isError is true, nil otherwise. Possible values: 'cancelled' 'no_camera' 'permission_denied' 'permission_denied_should_never_ask_again' 'unknown'

item.description: event.errorCode Type Number Event getLanguagesAndVoices See also getLanguagesAndVoices texttospeech.* Overview Unique error code, present when event.isError is true, nil otherwise.

item.description: event.errorCode Type Number Event init See also init texttospeech.* Overview Unique error code, present when event.isError is true, nil otherwise.

item.title: getDeferredAppLinkData
item.description: facebook.getDeferredAppLinkData() Type Function Return value none See also facebook.* Overview Asynchronously fetches app link information that might have been stored for use after installation of the app. Syntax facebook.getDeferredAppLinkData(params) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. listener required Listener. The listener receices the fbapplink event containing the deferred url.

item.description: object:getDescriptor() Type Function Return value Descriptor See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:getDescriptor( uuid ) uuid required String.

item.title: getFloatValue
item.description: object:getFloatValue() Type Function Return value Number See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:getFloatValue( [format], [offset] ) format optional String. "float" or "sfloat" (default). offset optional Number. Integer, default is 0.

item.title: getIncludedServices
item.description: object:getIncludedServices() Type Function Return value Array See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:getIncludedServices()

item.title: getIntValue
item.description: object:getIntValue() Type Function Return value Number See also bluetooth.* Overview Returns integer. Syntax object:getIntValue( [format], [offset] ) format optional String. "sint8", "sint16", "sint32" (default), "uint8", "uint16" or "uint32". offset optional Number. Integer, default is 0.

item.description: texttospeech.getLanguagesAndVoices() Type Function Return value getLanguagesAndVoices See also texttospeech.* Overview Returns the getLanguagesAndVoices event with a list of available languages and voices. Syntax texttospeech.getLanguagesAndVoices()

item.title: hasVibrator
item.description: vibrator.hasVibrator() Type Function Return value Boolean See also vibrator.* Overview Returns true if vibrator is present. On iOS it checks if the Taptic Engine API exists, that would be true on all iOS 10 devices, however currently only iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus or later can actually vibrate. Syntax vibrator.hasVibrator()

item.title: hide
item.description: mousecursor.hide() Type Function Return value none See also mousecursor.* Overview Disables mouse cursor. It becomes invisible. Syntax mousecursor.hide()

item.title: hide
item.description: object:hide() Type Function Return value none See also mousecursor.* Overview Makes a visible cursor hidden. On Windows instead of disappearing, cursor resets to the arrow. Syntax object:hide()

item.description: object.id Type Number See also bluetooth.* Overview Integer.

item.title: id
item.description: object.id Type Number See also bluetooth.* Overview Integer.

item.description: event.id Type String Event nfc See also nfc nfc.* Overview Optional TAG id.

item.title: id
item.description: event.id Type String Event onComplete See also onComplete texttospeech.* Overview The speech identifier. The value that has been supplied to texttospeech.speak().

item.description: event.id Type String Event onContinue See also onContinue texttospeech.* Overview The speech identifier. The value that has been supplied to texttospeech.speak().

item.title: id
item.description: event.id Type String Event onProgress See also onProgress texttospeech.* Overview The speech identifier. The value that has been supplied to texttospeech.speak().

item.title: includeDeviceName
item.description: object.includeDeviceName Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: includeTxPowerLevel
item.description: object.includeTxPowerLevel Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: init
item.description: bluetooth.init() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Initializes the plugin and calls the specified listener function to notify when the process is complete, or to provide error information. This call is required and must be executed before making other calls such as bluetooth.startScan(). Syntax bluetooth.init( [listener] ) listener optional Listener. Listener function which receives an init event.

item.title: init
item.description: chrometabs.init() Type Function Return value none See also chrometabs.* Overview The plugin does not require initialization, you can invoke chrometabs.show() straight away, but initialization helps preloading assets and reduces showing delay. Syntax chrometabs.init([params]) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. listener optional Boolean. Listener that receives chrometabs event.

item.title: init
item.description: facebook.init() Type Function Return value none See also facebook.* Overview Must be callled before you try to use the plugin. Syntax facebook.init([params]) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. autoLogAppEvents optional Boolean. Controls the auto logging of basic app events, such as activateApp and deactivateApp.

item.title: init
item.description: nfc.init() Type Function Return value none See also nfc.* Overview Initializes the NFC subsystem. Syntax nfc.init(listener) listener required Listener. Listener which receives the init event.

item.title: init
item.description: texttospeech.init() Type Function Return value none See also texttospeech.* Overview Must be callled before you try to synthesize any audio. Syntax 1 texttospeech.init([listener]) listener optional Listener. Listener which receives the init event. Syntax 2 texttospeech.init([params]) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. engine optional~(Android)~ String.

item.title: init
item.description: vk.init() Type Function Return value none See also vk.* Overview Must be callled before you can use other functions of the plugin. Syntax vk.init(appId, [permissions]) appId required String. VK application ID that you get on https://vk.com/dev. permissions optional Array. Array of strings. Specify VK permissions that your application needs. Available permissions 'notify', 'friends', 'photos', 'audio', 'video', 'docs', 'notes', 'pages', 'status', 'wall', 'groups', 'messages', 'notifications', 'stats', 'ads', 'offline', 'direct', 'email'.

item.title: intentType
item.description: event.intentType Type String Event nfc See also nfc nfc.* Overview Optional Android intent type.

item.title: invoke
item.description: haptic:invoke() Type Function Return value none See also vibrator.* Haptic Overview Invokes the Taptic Engine. Syntax haptic:invoke([notificationType]) notificationType optional String. Only for the 'notification' haptic type. Vibrates with different patterns based on the notification type, can be 'success' (default), 'warning' or 'error'.

item.title: isActive
item.description: bluetooth.isActive Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event advertising See also advertising bluetooth.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event init See also init bluetooth.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event scan See also scan bluetooth.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onCharacteristicChanged See also onCharacteristicChanged bluetooth.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onCharacteristicReadRequest See also onCharacteristicReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview false.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onCharacteristicReadRequest See also onCharacteristicReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview false.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onConnectionStateChange See also onConnectionStateChange bluetooth.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onDescriptorReadRequest See also onDescriptorReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview false.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onDescriptorWriteRequest See also onDescriptorWriteRequest bluetooth.* Overview false.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onExecuteWrite See also onExecuteWrite bluetooth.* Overview false.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onMtuChanged See also onMtuChanged bluetooth.* Overview false.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onNotificationSent See also onNotificationSent bluetooth.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onServiceAdded See also onServiceAdded bluetooth.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event chrometabs See also chrometabs chrometabs.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event fbapplink See also fbapplink facebook.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event beam See also beam nfc.* Overview Always false.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event init See also init nfc.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event nfc See also nfc nfc.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error or when the iOS NFC reading dialog is closed.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event writeTag See also writeTag nfc.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event show See also show qrscanner.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event getLanguagesAndVoices See also getLanguagesAndVoices texttospeech.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event init See also init texttospeech.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onComplete See also onComplete texttospeech.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onContinue See also onContinue texttospeech.* Overview Always false.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onPause See also onPause texttospeech.* Overview Always false.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onProgress See also onProgress texttospeech.* Overview Always false.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event onStart See also onStart texttospeech.* Overview Always false.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event login See also login vk.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event request See also request vk.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event showShareDialog See also showShareDialog vk.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: isExecution
item.description: event.isExecution Type Boolean Event onExecuteWrite See also onExecuteWrite bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isHttpsRequired
item.description: object.isHttpsRequired Type Boolean See also vk.* Overview true if user has enabled the secure connection setting in his or her VK account.

item.title: isLoggedIn
item.description: vk.isLoggedIn() Type Function Return value Boolean See also vk.* Overview Returns true if the user has logged in. Syntax vk.isLoggedIn()

item.title: isMultipleAdvertisementSupported
item.description: bluetooth.isMultipleAdvertisementSupported Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isOffloadedFilteringSupported
item.description: bluetooth.isOffloadedFilteringSupported Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isOffloadedScanBatchingSupported
item.description: bluetooth.isOffloadedScanBatchingSupported Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.description: event.isPreparedWrite Type Boolean Event onCharacteristicReadRequest See also onCharacteristicReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isPreparedWrite
item.description: event.isPreparedWrite Type Boolean Event onDescriptorWriteRequest See also onDescriptorWriteRequest bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isPrimary
item.description: object.isPrimary Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isResponseNeeded
item.description: event.isResponseNeeded Type Boolean Event onCharacteristicReadRequest See also onCharacteristicReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isResponseNeeded
item.description: event.isResponseNeeded Type Boolean Event onDescriptorWriteRequest See also onDescriptorWriteRequest bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isScanning
item.description: bluetooth.isScanning Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isSpeaking
item.description: texttospeech.isSpeaking() Type Function Return value Boolean See also texttospeech.* Overview Returns true if currently speaking. Syntax texttospeech.isSpeaking()

item.title: logEvent
item.description: facebook.logEvent() Type Function Return value none See also facebook.* Overview Log an app event. Syntax facebook.logEvent(params) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. name required String. Name of the event. value optional Number. Value to sum of the event. params optional Table. Additional parameters of the event, e.

item.title: login
item.description: vk.login() Type Function Return value none See also vk.* Overview User authentication. Uses official VK application if available. Syntax vk.login(params) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. userInitiated optional Boolean. If not specified or false the user won’t be promted with a login window. Use it to silently authorize the user at the start of your application if he or she has logged in before.

item.title: logout
item.description: vk.logout() Type Function Return value none See also vk.* Overview Deauthorizes the user. Syntax vk.logout()

item.title: logPurchase
item.description: facebook.logPurchase() Type Function Return value none See also facebook.* Overview Log an app purchase manually. Only use it if you have configured your app not to log purchases automatically. Syntax facebook.logPurchase(params) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. currency required String. Name of the currency, e.

item.title: majorClass
item.description: object.majorClass Type String See also bluetooth.* Overview "audio video", "computer", "health", "imaging", "misc", "networking", "peripheral", "phone", "toy", "uncategorized", "wearable".

item.title: manufacturers
item.description: object.manufacturers Type Array See also bluetooth.* Overview Elements are tables. Element id required Number. data required String.

item.title: maxLength
item.description: event.maxLength Type Integer Event init Platform Android 4.3+ See also init texttospeech.* Overview The maximum length of the text that can be passed to the speech engine.

item.title: mayLaunchUrl
item.description: chrometabs.mayLaunchUrl() Type Function Return value none See also chrometabs.* Overview Tell the browser which URLs are likely to be requested so that some preloading can happen. A session has to be started before calling this function with chrometabs.newSession(). Syntax chrometabs.mayLaunchUrl(url, additional_urls) url required String. The most probable URL. additional_urls optional Table. The list of other less probable URLs. More probable URLs come first.

item.title: message
item.description: event.message Type String Event show See also show qrscanner.* Overview String decoded message from a QR code or a barcode.

item.title: messages
item.description: event.messages Type Array Event nfc See also nfc nfc.* Overview Present only when event.type is 'ndef'. Contains NDEF message, which consists of NDEF records. Each element of the array is a table with the following properties. Properties id String. Record id value. tnf String. TNF value. Can be 'absolute uri', 'empty', 'external type', 'mime media', 'unchanged', 'unknown' or 'well known'. type String. NDEF type.

item.title: mode
item.description: event.mode Type String Event advertising See also advertising bluetooth.* Overview "low latency", "low power" or "balanced".

item.title: mtu
item.description: event.mtu Type String Event onMtuChanged See also onMtuChanged bluetooth.* Overview

item.description: event.name Type String Event advertising See also advertising bluetooth.* Overview The string "advertising".

item.description: event.name Type String Event scan See also scan bluetooth.* Overview The string "scan".

item.title: name
item.description: object.name Type String See also bluetooth.* Overview Can be nil.

item.description: event.name Type String Event onCharacteristicChanged See also onCharacteristicChanged bluetooth.* Overview The string "onCharacteristicChanged".

item.description: event.name Type String Event onCharacteristicRead See also onCharacteristicRead bluetooth.* Overview The string "onCharacteristicRead".

item.description: event.name Type String Event onCharacteristicWrite See also onCharacteristicWrite bluetooth.* Overview The string "onCharacteristicWrite".

item.description: event.name Type String Event onConnectionStateChange See also onConnectionStateChange bluetooth.* Overview The string "onConnectionStateChange".

item.description: event.name Type String Event onServicesDiscovered See also onServicesDiscovered bluetooth.* Overview The string "onServicesDiscovered".

item.title: name
item.description: event.name Type String Event onCharacteristicReadRequest See also onCharacteristicReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview The string "onCharacteristicReadRequest".

item.description: event.name Type String Event onConnectionStateChange See also onConnectionStateChange bluetooth.* Overview The string "onConnectionStateChange".

item.description: event.name Type String Event onDescriptorReadRequest See also onDescriptorReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview The string "onDescriptorReadRequest".

item.description: event.name Type String Event onDescriptorWriteRequest See also onDescriptorWriteRequest bluetooth.* Overview The string "onDescriptorWriteRequest".

item.description: event.name Type String Event onExecuteWrite See also onExecuteWrite bluetooth.* Overview The string "onExecuteWrite".

item.description: event.name Type String Event onMtuChanged See also onMtuChanged bluetooth.* Overview The string "onMtuChanged".

item.description: event.name Type String Event onNotificationSent See also onNotificationSent bluetooth.* Overview The string "onNotificationSent".

item.title: name
item.description: event.name Type String Event onServiceAdded See also onServiceAdded bluetooth.* Overview The string "onServiceAdded".

item.description: event.name Type String Event chrometabs See also chrometabs chrometabs.* Overview The string "chrometabs".

item.title: name
item.description: event.name Type String Event fbapplink See also fbapplink facebook.* Overview The string "fbapplink".

item.title: name
item.description: event.name Type String Event beam See also beam nfc.* Overview The string "beam".

item.title: name
item.description: event.name Type String Event init See also init nfc.* Overview The string "init".

item.title: name
item.description: event.name Type String Event nfc See also nfc nfc.* Overview The string "nfc".

item.title: name
item.description: event.name Type String Event writeTag See also writeTag nfc.* Overview The string "writeTag".

item.title: name
item.description: event.name Type String Event show See also show qrscanner.* Overview The string "show".

item.title: name
item.description: event.name Type String Event getLanguagesAndVoices See also getLanguagesAndVoices texttospeech.* Overview The string "getLanguagesAndVoices".

item.description: event.name Type String Event init See also init texttospeech.* Overview The string "init".

item.description: event.name Type String Event onComplete See also onComplete texttospeech.* Overview The string "onComplete".

item.title: newCursor
item.description: mousecursor.newCursor() Type Function Return value Cursor See also mousecursor.* Overview Creates a cursor instance. The cursor is not visible by defualt, call cursor:show() to make it visible. You can either use standard system cursors like crosshair or pointing hand, or load a custom image to be used as a cursor. If you are using several cursors in your app, there is no need to create a new instance each time mouse enters a specified area.

item.title: newHaptic
item.description: vibrator.newHaptic() Type Function Return value Haptic See also vibrator.* Overview Returns a Haptic object, which provides the direct access to the Apple’s Taptic Engine. iOS only. For more details on that API please refer to the Apple’s Reference. Syntax vibrator.newHaptic([type], [intensity]) type optional String. Haptic feedback type, can be 'impact' (default), 'selection' or 'notification'. intensity optional String. Intensity level of 'impact' haptic, can be 'light', 'medium' (default) or 'heavy'.

item.title: newServer
item.description: bluetooth.newServer() Type Function Return value Server See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.newServer( params ) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. onCharacteristicReadRequest optional Listener. onCharacteristicWriteRequest optional Listener. onConnectionStateChange optional Listener. onDescriptorReadRequest optional Listener. onDescriptorWriteRequest optional Listener. onExecuteWrite optional Listener. onMtuChanged optional Listener. onNotificationSent optional Listener.

item.title: newSession
item.description: chrometabs.newSession() Type Function Return value none See also chrometabs.* Overview Starts a new session. When a session has been activated you may call chrometabs.mayLaunchUrl(), a new session after that decreases priority of provided URLs. The plugin must be initialized. Syntax chrometabs.newSession()

item.title: notifyCharacteristicChanged
item.description: object:notifyCharacteristicChanged() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:notifyCharacteristicChanged( device, characteristic, [isConfirmationNeeded] ) device required Device. characteristic required Characteristic. isConfirmationNeeded optional Boolean.

item.title: offset
item.description: event.offset Type Number Event onCharacteristicReadRequest See also onCharacteristicReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview Integer.

item.title: offset
item.description: event.offset Type Number Event onCharacteristicReadRequest See also onCharacteristicReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview Integer.

item.title: offset
item.description: event.offset Type Number Event onDescriptorReadRequest See also onDescriptorReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview Integer.

item.title: offset
item.description: event.offset Type Number Event onDescriptorWriteRequest See also onDescriptorWriteRequest bluetooth.* Overview Integer.

item.title: pause
item.description: texttospeech.pause() Type Function Return value none See also texttospeech.* Overview Pauses an ongoing speech. Can be resumed by texttospeech.continue() Syntax texttospeech.pause(waitForWordEnd) waitForWordEnd optional Boolean. If true, the speech will be interrupted at the word end. Otherwise the speech will be interrupted immediately.

item.title: peerLlcpMajorVersion
item.description: event.peerLlcpMajorVersion Type Number Event beam See also beam nfc.* Overview The major LLCP version number of the peer associated with the transfer. Requires Android 6.0+.

item.title: peerLlcpMinorVersion
item.description: event.peerLlcpMinorVersion Type Number Event beam See also beam nfc.* Overview The minor LLCP version number of the peer associated with the transfer. Requires Android 6.0+.

item.title: permissions
item.description: object.permissions Type Array See also bluetooth.* Overview Can contain "read", "read encrypted", "read encrypted mitm", "write", "write encrypted", "write encrypted mitm", "write signed" and "write signed mitm".

item.title: permissions
item.description: object.permissions Type Array See also bluetooth.* Overview Can contain "read", "read encrypted", "read encrypted mitm", "write", "write encrypted", "write encrypted mitm", "write signed" and "write signed mitm".

item.title: phase
item.description: event.phase Type String Event chrometabs See also chrometabs chrometabs.* Overview Phase, 'init'.

item.title: phase
item.description: event.phase Type String Event beam See also beam nfc.* Overview Indicates the phase of the NFC beaming process. 'started' - the beaming transfer has just started. 'completed' - the beaming transfer has just completed.

item.title: prepare
item.description: haptic:prepare() Type Function Return value none See also vibrator.* Haptic Overview Puts the Taptic Engine into the prepared state, in which a shortly delayed call to invoke() has a smaller latency. Syntax haptic:prepare()

item.title: promotionCode
item.description: event.promotionCode Type String Event fbapplink See also fbapplink facebook.* Overview The promotion code string. Android only.

item.title: properties
item.description: object.properties Type Array See also bluetooth.* Overview Can contain "broadcast", "extended props", "indicate", "notify", "read", "signed write", "write" and "write no response".

item.title: readCharacteristic
item.description: object:readCharacteristic() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:readCharacteristic( characteristic ) characteristic required Characteristic.

item.title: readDescriptor
item.description: object:readDescriptor() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:readDescriptor( descriptor ) descriptor required Descriptor.

item.title: readRemoteRssi
item.description: object:readRemoteRssi() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:readRemoteRssi()

item.title: record
item.description: event.record Type String Event scan See also scan bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: ref
item.description: event.ref Type String Event fbapplink See also fbapplink facebook.* Overview The ref string. Android only.

item.title: referer
item.description: event.referer Type String Event fbapplink See also fbapplink facebook.* Overview The referer bundle string. Android only.

item.title: releaseTag
item.description: nfc.releaseTag() Type Function Return value none Platform Android only See also nfc.* Overview Release a previously discovered tag, meaning that you don’t plan to write any data to it. Syntax nfc.releaseTag()

item.title: removeListener
item.description: nfc.removeListener() Type Function Return value none See also nfc.* Overview Removes a previously defined with nfc.setListener() listener. Syntax nfc.removeListener()

item.title: removeService
item.description: object:removeService() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:removeService( service ) service required Service.

item.title: request
item.description: vk.request() Type Function Return value none See also vk.* Overview Queries VK server with the specified request and delivers it’s response. Syntax vk.request(method, params, [listener]) method required String. VK API method. See the list of methods. params required Table. Table of strings keys and various values to be submitted with the request. Each method has it’s own set of valid params. listener optional Listener.

item.title: requestConnectionPriority
item.description: object:requestConnectionPriority() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:requestConnectionPriority( priority ) priority required String. "high", "low power" or "balanced".

item.title: requestId
item.description: event.requestId Type String Event onCharacteristicReadRequest See also onCharacteristicReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: requestId
item.description: event.requestId Type String Event onCharacteristicReadRequest See also onCharacteristicReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: requestId
item.description: event.requestId Type String Event onDescriptorReadRequest See also onDescriptorReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: requestId
item.description: event.requestId Type String Event onDescriptorWriteRequest See also onDescriptorWriteRequest bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: requestId
item.description: event.requestId Type String Event onExecuteWrite See also onExecuteWrite bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: requestMtu
item.description: object:requestMtu() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:requestMtu( mtu ) mtu required Number.

item.title: response
item.description: event.response Type String Event request See also request vk.* Overview VK server’s response string.

item.title: rssi
item.description: event.rssi Type Number Event scan See also scan bluetooth.* Overview Integer.

item.title: rssi
item.description: event.rssi Type Number Event onReadRemoteRssi See also onReadRemoteRssi bluetooth.* Overview Integer.

item.title: secret
item.description: object.secret Type String See also vk.* Overview Access token’s secret, whatever that means.

item.title: sendResponse
item.description: object:sendResponse() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:sendResponse( device, requestId, status, value, [offset] ) device required Device. requestId required String. status required String. value required String. offset optional Number.

item.title: services
item.description: object.services Type Array See also bluetooth.* Overview Elements are tables. Element uuid required String. data optional String.

item.title: setCharacteristicNotification
item.description: object:setCharacteristicNotification() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:setCharacteristicNotification( characteristic, isEnabled ) characteristic required Characteristic. isEnabled required Boolean.

item.title: setFloatValue
item.description: object:setFloatValue() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:setFloatValue( mantissa, exponent, [format], [offset] ) mantissa required Number. Integer. exponent required Number. Integer. format optional String. "float" or "sfloat" (default). offset optional Number. Integer, default is 0.

item.title: setIntValue
item.description: object:setIntValue() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:setIntValue( value, [format], [offset] ) value required Number. Integer. format optional String. "sint8", "sint16", "sint32" (default), "uint8", "uint16" or "uint32". offset optional Number. Integer, default is 0.

item.title: setLimitEventAndDataUsage
item.description: facebook.setLimitEventAndDataUsage() Type Function Return value none See also facebook.* Overview Sets whether data such as that generated through Facebook SDK AppEvents and sent to Facebook should be restricted from being used for other than analytics and conversions. Defaults is false. This value is stored on the device and persists across app launches. Syntax facebook.setLimitEventAndDataUsage(state)

item.title: setListener
item.description: nfc.setListener() Type Function Return value none See also nfc.* Overview Sets a listener to recieve reading TAGs nfc events. If there is a pending NFC event, the listener will be invoked right away. Pending event can occur when your app is launched due to an NFC device being discovered. Syntax nfc.setListener(listener)

item.title: setName
item.description: bluetooth.setName() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.setName( name ) name required String.

item.title: setPairingConfirmation
item.description: object:setPairingConfirmation() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:setPairingConfirmation( isConfirmed ) isConfirmed required Boolean.

item.title: setPin
item.description: object:setPin() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:setPin( pin ) pin required String.

item.title: setStringValue
item.description: object:setStringValue() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:setStringValue( value ) value required String.

item.title: setValue
item.description: object:setValue() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:setValue( value ) value required String.

item.title: setValue
item.description: object:setValue() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:setValue( value ) value required String.

item.title: setWriteType
item.description: object:setWriteType() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:setWriteType( writeType ) format required String. "default", "no response" or "signed".

item.title: show
item.description: chrometabs.show() Type Function Return value none See also chrometabs.* Overview Asynchronously fetches app link information that might have been stored for use after installation of the app. Syntax chrometabs.show(params) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. url required String. URL to load. shareMenu optional Boolean.

item.title: show
item.description: mousecursor.show() Type Function Return value none See also mousecursor.* Overview Makes mouse cursors visible again. Syntax mousecursor.show()

item.title: show
item.description: object:show() Type Function Return value none See also mousecursor.* Overview Makes a previously hidden or just created cursor visible. Syntax object:show()

item.title: show
item.description: nfc.show() Type Function Return value none Platform iOS only See also nfc.* Overview Shows iOS native NFC reading dialog. Syntax nfc.show(params) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. message optional String. A message that appears inside the dialog window with instructions for a user, e.

item.title: show
item.description: qrscanner.show() Type Function Return value none See also qrscanner.* Overview Opens the scanner view. Syntax qrscanner.show(params) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. topbar optional Table. Topbar options, see below for details. useFrontCamera optional Boolean. Set to true to use the front camera if it’s available.

item.title: show
item.description: toast.show() Type Function Return value none See also toast.* Overview Shows a toast message. Syntax toast.show(message, [params]) name required String. Text to be displayed. params optional Table. Additional parameters. Parameter reference The params table includes parameters for the call. duration optional String. Display time, possible values are 'short' and 'long'. Short is 2 seconds, long is 3.5 seconds. On Android it is system dependent.

item.title: showShareDialog
item.description: vk.showShareDialog() Type Function Return value none See also vk.* Overview Shows a share popup window, which user can use to edit and post a message on his or her VK wall. Syntax vk.showShareDialog(params) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. text optional String. Message text.

item.title: speak
item.description: texttospeech.speak() Type Function Return value none See also texttospeech.* Overview Generates and plays the speech. This process is not instant and it will take some time before you actually hear the sound. Syntax texttospeech.speak(text, [params]) text required String. The text to be spoken by a speech engine. params optional Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details.

item.title: start
item.description: event.start Type Integer Event onProgress Platform Not Android See also onProgress texttospeech.* Overview The start position inside the passed text of the substring, that is currently being processed.

item.title: startAdvertising
item.description: bluetooth.startAdvertising() Type Function Return value Userdata See also bluetooth.* Overview Returns a Userdata representing an advertising id. Syntax bluetooth.startAdvertising( params ) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. mode optional String. "low latency", "low power", "balanced" (default). isConnectable optional Boolean. default is false. timeout optional Number.

item.title: startScan
item.description: bluetooth.startScan() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.startScan( [scanListener], [period] ) scanListener optional Listener. period optional Number. integer, default is 10000.

item.title: state
item.description: event.state Type String Event onConnectionStateChange See also onConnectionStateChange bluetooth.* Overview "connected", "disconnected", "connecting" or "disconnecting".

item.title: state
item.description: event.state Type String Event onConnectionStateChange See also onConnectionStateChange bluetooth.* Overview "connected", "disconnected", "connecting" or "disconnecting".

item.title: stop
item.description: texttospeech.stop() Type Function Return value none See also texttospeech.* Overview Stops an ongoing speech. Syntax texttospeech.stop(waitForWordEnd) waitForWordEnd optional Boolean. If true, the speech will be interrupted at the word end. Otherwise the speech will be interrupted immediately.

item.title: stopAdvertising
item.description: bluetooth.stopAdvertising() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.stopAdvertising( advertisingId ) advertisingId required Userdata.

item.title: stopScan
item.description: bluetooth.stopScan() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.stopScan()

item.title: symbol
item.description: event.symbol Type String Event show See also show qrscanner.* Overview String indicates the type of symbol that was scanned. iOS only.

item.title: tag
item.description: event.tag Type Table Event nfc See also nfc nfc.* Overview Present only when event.type is 'tag'. Holds information about the discovered TAG. Properties id String. TAG id value. toString String. Simple string representation of the TAG. techs Array. List of technologies supported by the tag.

item.title: timeout
item.description: event.timeout Type Number Event advertising See also advertising bluetooth.* Overview Integer.

item.title: timestamp
item.description: object.timestamp Type String Platform Android See also vk.* Overview UNIX timestamp of the time when the access token has been created.

item.title: true
item.description: flashlight.on() Type Function Return value none See also toast.* Overview Turns on the flashlight. Syntax flashlight.on()

item.title: txPowerLevel
item.description: event.txPowerLevel Type Number Event advertising See also advertising bluetooth.* Overview Integer.

item.title: type
item.description: object.type Type String See also bluetooth.* Overview "classic", "low energy", "dual", "unknown".

item.title: type
item.description: event.type Type String Event nfc See also nfc nfc.* Overview The type of the NFC device. Either 'tag' or 'ndef'.

item.title: url
item.description: event.url Type String Event fbapplink See also fbapplink facebook.* Overview The url string.

item.title: userId
item.description: object.userId Type String See also vk.* Overview User VK id.

item.title: uuid
item.description: object.uuid Type String See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: uuid
item.description: object.uuid Type String See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: uuid
item.description: object.uuid Type String See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: uuids
item.description: object.uuids Type Array See also bluetooth.* Overview Can be nil.

item.title: value
item.description: event.value Type String Event onCharacteristicReadRequest See also onCharacteristicReadRequest bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: value
item.description: event.value Type String Event onDescriptorWriteRequest See also onDescriptorWriteRequest bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: vibrate
item.description: vibrator.vibrate() Type Function Return value none See also vibrator.* Overview Vibrates for a specified duration or with a specified pattern. Syntax for a simple vibration vibrator.vibrate(duration) duration required Integer. Duration of the vibration in milliseconds. Syntax for a pattern vibration vibrator.vibrate(pattern, [repeat]) pattern required Array. An array of integers that are the durations for which to turn on and off the vibrator in milliseconds.

item.title: warmup
item.description: chrometabs.warmup() Type Function Return value Boolean See also chrometabs.* Overview Preloads some resources for faster browser startup. The plugin must be initialized. Returns true on success. Syntax chrometabs.warmup()

item.title: writeCharacteristic
item.description: object:writeCharacteristic() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:writeCharacteristic( characteristic ) characteristic required Characteristic.

item.title: writeDescriptor
item.description: object:writeDescriptor() Type Function Return value Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax object:writeDescriptor( descriptor ) descriptor required Descriptor.

item.title: writeTag
item.description: nfc.writeTag() Type Function Return value none Platform Android only See also nfc.* Overview Writes the provided NDEF message into the recently discovered NFC tag. Therefore call this only after you have discovered a TAG. Syntax nfc.writeTag(params) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call.
